item.description:
Cinema City at the Palace has released the next few weekends' schedule for Cinema Classics. These movies cost only $5 per ticket ($4 for Criterion Club members) and show at 11:00am on Saturday and Sunday. I will choose one of the days and if you can't go on that day and want to go the other day, feel free. If the majority of the people say they prefer the other day, I'll move the meetup.

"The Maltese Falcon" - John Huston's directorial debut, starring Humphrey Bogart, Mary Astor, Peter Lorre, and of course, a certain statuette. 100 minutes, 1941, film noir (not just black-and-white).

The films are shown without previews (bonus!) so I set the meetup time fifteen minutes early. If you get there after 11:00am you might miss the start of the movie.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Cinema Classics - "The Maltese Falcon"
